DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effectiveness and safety of recombinant human erythropoietin in anemic cancer patients undergoing chemotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Recombinant Human Erythropoietin in Anemic Cancer Patients Undergoing Chemotherapy
DOC.criteria: Cancer patients a history of myocardial, cerebral or pulmonary infarction severe hypertension beyond control by drugs
